content.metaTitle: Villa Momentum Jávea - €1.425M 4 Bed Luxury Villa Sale
content.metaDescription: Exclusive 4-bedroom Villa Momentum in Jávea with sea & Montgó views. 1000m² plot, pool, modern design. €1,425,000. Prime Costa Blanca location near beaches.
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa Momentum, an exceptional contemporary villa that redefines luxury living in Jávea's prestigious Cap Martí area. This stunning 4-bedroom, 4-bathroom residence sits on a generous 1000m² plot, offering breathtaking panoramic views of the iconic Montgó mountain and the sparkling Mediterranean Sea. With its modern architectural design and premium finishes, Villa Momentum represents the perfect fusion of sophisticated style and Costa Blanca's natural beauty.

Developed by renowned Miralbo Urbana, this exclusive property features 165m² of thoughtfully designed living space, complemented by expansive terraces, landscaped gardens, and a pristine swimming pool. Located in the secure Monte Olimpo development, Villa Momentum offers the ultimate in privacy and tranquility while remaining just minutes from Jávea's golden beaches, international amenities, and world-class golf facilities.

locationSection.intro:
Cap Martí represents one of Jávea's most coveted residential areas, perfectly positioned between the dramatic Montgó Natural Park and the azure waters of the Mediterranean. This exclusive enclave offers residents the rare combination of mountain serenity and coastal accessibility, with some of the Costa Blanca's most spectacular viewpoints literally on your doorstep. The elevated position ensures privacy and panoramic vistas while maintaining convenient access to all of Jávea's attractions.

The Monte Olimpo development specifically has been designed as a premium residential community, offering 24/7 security and an exclusive atmosphere that attracts discerning international buyers. With El Arenal Beach just minutes away, residents enjoy easy access to Jávea's vibrant beachfront dining scene, water sports facilities, and the famous Thursday market. The location also provides excellent connectivity to international schools, making it ideal for families seeking a luxury Mediterranean lifestyle.
highlights: Just 5 minutes drive to El Arenal Beach and marina
Walking distance to Montgó Natural Park hiking trails
10 minutes to Jávea Golf Club and premium facilities
Close proximity to international schools and healthcare
Easy access to both Alicante and Valencia airports

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa Momentum showcases contemporary Mediterranean architecture at its finest, with clean lines, natural materials, and an emphasis on indoor-outdoor living. Every detail has been carefully considered to create a harmonious blend of luxury, functionality, and connection to the stunning natural surroundings.
features: 4 spacious bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and natural light
4 elegant bathrooms with premium fixtures and finishes
Open-plan living and dining area with floor-to-ceiling windows
Fully equipped designer kitchen with high-end appliances
Expansive terraces with panoramic sea and mountain views
Private swimming pool with sun deck and outdoor shower
Landscaped Mediterranean gardens with automatic irrigation
Pre-installation for air conditioning and underfloor heating
Private parking and additional storage space

content.investmentSection:
Villa Momentum represents an exceptional investment opportunity in one of Spain's most desirable coastal destinations. Jávea's property market has demonstrated remarkable resilience and consistent growth, driven by international demand for premium Mediterranean real estate. The combination of limited available land, strict building regulations, and the area's UNESCO-protected natural environment ensures exclusivity and long-term value appreciation.

The rental market in Jávea is particularly strong, with luxury villas commanding premium rates from discerning holiday makers and long-term international residents. Villa Momentum's superior location, modern amenities, and stunning views position it perfectly for both personal enjoyment and investment returns. With Spain's Golden Visa program and favorable tax treaties, this property also offers potential residency benefits for international buyers seeking European Union access.
whyBuySection: Exclusive Miralbo Urbana development with proven track record of quality
Unparalleled panoramic views of Montgó mountain and Mediterranean Sea
Prime location minutes from beaches, golf, and international amenities
Secure gated community with 24/7 surveillance and privacy
Contemporary design with premium finishes and attention to detail
Strong rental potential in Jávea's thriving luxury market
Excellent investment prospects in a protected, limited-supply area

faqs.question: What is the total price and are there payment plan options available?
faqs.answer: Villa Momentum is priced at €1,425,000. Payment plans may be available depending on construction stage. Please contact our team to discuss flexible payment options and current availability.

faqs.question: How far is the property from Jávea's main beaches and amenities?
faqs.answer: The villa is just 5 minutes drive from El Arenal Beach, 10 minutes from Jávea Golf Club, and walking distance from Montgó Natural Park. International schools, supermarkets, and restaurants are all within easy reach.

faqs.question: What is the buying process for international purchasers?
faqs.answer: The process includes reservation, due diligence, preliminary contract, and final completion. We provide full legal support and can recommend trusted English-speaking lawyers and notaries to guide you through each step.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing for this property?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with specialist mortgage brokers including Habeno who can arrange competitive financing for international buyers. Spanish banks typically offer mortgages up to 70% for non-residents.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for Villa Momentum?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas in Jávea achieve excellent rental returns, particularly with sea views and premium locations. Weekly rates can range from €2,000-4,000+ depending on season, with strong year-round demand.

faqs.question: When will the villa be completed and ready for occupation?
faqs.answer: Please contact us for current construction timeline and expected completion dates. Miralbo Urbana has an excellent track record for on-time delivery of their premium developments.

faqs.question: What is included in the purchase price?
faqs.answer: The price includes the villa, pool, landscaped gardens, fitted kitchen, wardrobes, and pre-installations. Premium appliances, furniture packages, and additional features can be discussed separately.

faqs.question: Can I arrange a viewing of Villa Momentum?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We can arrange viewings of the development, show homes, and discuss the project in detail. Virtual tours and video calls are also available for international clients.

faqs.question: Are there any additional costs or community fees?
faqs.answer: Additional costs include Spanish taxes (approximately 10-12% total), legal fees, and ongoing community charges for security and maintenance. We provide a detailed breakdown of all costs upfront.

content.conclusion: Villa Momentum represents a rare opportunity to own a piece of paradise in one of Costa Blanca's most prestigious locations. With its stunning views, contemporary design, and unbeatable location just minutes from Jávea's best beaches and amenities, this exceptional property offers the perfect blend of luxury living and investment potential. Don't miss your chance to secure this exclusive villa in the sought-after Monte Olimpo development.
